name: Cake and Food Puzzle Free
description:
There are so many delicious types of food and if you like different cuisines, cooking or just eating, then you will like our Cake and Food puzzle which gives you a nice selection of beautiful pictures that you can turn into nice puzzles. Pick a picture from the gallery, choose your difficulty level and enjoy the puzzle.
If you can't find your picture in our selection, pick one from your device or take a picture with your camera and turn it into a jigsaw puzzle.
As soon as you are done with the pieces you can share your result with your friends or challenge someone else to solve it faster. You can also set the picture as a wallpaper to have it on your display and enjoy the picture on your device. If your child wants to play, just enable the Kids mode to make Cake and Food puzzle simpler and easier for young players.

Our categories in the gallery:
* Breakfasts
* Meals
* Fruits
* Desserts
* Cupcakes

The features of the puzzle:
* It is not required to have internet access to play the food puzzles game (works in offline mode)
* Many nice high definition pictures sorted in a gallery
* Lots of difficulty levels
* Smooth game-play. (Uses the hardware acceleration of the device.)
* Game timer.
* Share result/picture.
* Multitouch zoom and piece rotation
* Zoom In / Out.
* Piece rotation.
* Save game.
* Best score statistics.
* Set picture as wallpaper.
* Nice background nature music.
* Magical sound effects.
* Vibration on piece merge.
* Kids mode
* The Cake Jigsaw Puzzle is free.
